page.title: 10TRANSPORT - THE A396
page.content: The{A396 Tiverton to Exeter road}runs through this area. It carries a continuous flow of mixed traffic including coaches, heavy lorries, cars and local farm traffic, with a noticeable increase in summer. This part of the A396 is marked as a {holiday route}taking traffic from the new Link Road from the M5 to North Cornwall. It is narrow and winding in this section, and is not,in the opinion of many local people, entirely suitable for the weight of traffic encouraged to use it, particularly when slow farm vehicles are forced to compete with holiday traffic. This can create a dangerous situation. There is a regular{bus service}- 14 buses to Tiverton per day.
